version_description: Thanks for playing My Little Pony Pocket Ponies! We’ve squashed a few pesky bugs that were still puttering around! Get ready for exciting ARCADE ACTION!

Continue your arcade popping adventures with this AWESOME update!

• New Pocket Ponies characters will start at a higher level based on how rare they are. How cool!
• Your Pocket Pony faints in game? Now you can call your squad for help during a challenge.
• Get fantastic rewards when completing a Pocket Ponies’ collection.
• A few pesky bugs have been squashed for smoother adventures.

Join this update for more POPPING FUN!

Continue your arcade popping adventures with this AWESOME update!

• New Pocket Ponies characters will start at a higher level based on how rare they are. How cool!
• Your Pocket Pony faints in game? Now you can call your squad for help during a challenge.
• Get fantastic rewards when completing a Pocket Ponies’ collection.
• A few pesky bugs have been squashed for smoother adventures.

Join this update for more POPPING FUN!

It’s a WINTER WONDERLAND at the School of Friendship!

As snow falls, TWILIGHT SPARKLE kept busy decorating every classroom for more festive and joyful Pocket Ponies arcade challenges! Oh and a few pesky bugs have also been squashed for smoother winter adventures.

Join this update for more POPPING FUN!

Festive WINTER adventures await you in this sweet update!
• MYSTERY BOXES - How fun is it to open mystery boxes full of Pocket Ponies surprises?
• NEW POCKET PONIES - Play exciting arcade challenges with our new FRIENDS OF THE EMPIRE or festive ponies from the WINTER COLLECTION!
• A few bugs have been squashed for smoother adventures!

Warm up for more crazy popping action!

Unleash your Pony Power with this sweet update!

• Masters and teachers have revised their challenges, bet you can’t beat them now!
• Spring has come early this year at the School of Friendship. Time to take off our super cute winter hats!
• A few bugs have been squashed for smoother arcade popping adventures!

Everypony, new adventures await you at the School of Friendship! A whole new area is available to explore: the Forest Path!

• NEW LEVELS – 27 new arcade popping levels to complete!
• NEW POCKET PONIES – Play exciting challenges with Pocket Ponies from the new collections: RETRO PONIES or PETS!
• NEW MASTER & TEACHERS – Face-off against newcomers, such as Gabby, Apple Bloom, Trixie and Zecora. Rank high enough to take on the new Pocket Pony Master: Fluttershy!
• A few bugs have been squashed for smoother adventures!

Join this update and complete quests to restore all colors lost in the Forest Path!

Minor improvements. Thank you for playing My Little Pony Pocket Ponies
